Title: If the target is ten, take measures to achieve twelve with soaring enthusiasm!
Designer: Zhang Xiwu (张锡武)Na Qiming (那启明)
Publisher: Tianjin meishu chubanshe (天津美术出版社)
Notes: This is a print from the second impression (May 1959).The poster can be seen in the background of a photograph by Brian Brake, showing pedi-cab drivers in a restaurant, Liulichang street, Beijing. The photograph is less 'staged' than many comparable images, showing a slightly grubby setting, and the poster pinned to the wall with thumbtacks.
